articles.description: Starknet v0.12 Mainnet Starknet launches the v0.12 upgrade to its mainnet, increases throughput by 10x, and marks the Quant Leap upgrade's beginning - providing enhanced performance and scalability. Kava 14 Live Kava 14 is live on mainnet. The â€˜internal bridgeâ€™ in the upgrade enables users to transfer native IBC assets from Cosmos to EVM ecosystems.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Starknet v0.12 Mainnet, Kava 14 Live, Leverage Trading on Optimism, ...

articles.description: Linea Mainnet Alpha ConsenSys L2 Linea launches mainnet alpha and starts to onboard launch partners. Linea will open the network to the public next week at EthCC. In the launch post, Linea claims there is no token as it uses ETH as the network currency.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - ConsenSys Linea Alpha, Rodeo Exploit, Native BTC Bridging, ...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Stader ETHx Live Stader launches ETHx along with $1M in launch incentives. The incentives include a 1.5x staking boost, 800k in LP rewards, and rewards for DAOs & communities. Swaap V2 Live Market-making protocol Swaap launches v2 on Ethereum and Polygon. V2 introduces enhancements for LPs, such as optimized market-making strategies, partnerships with institutions, incentives for early participation, etc.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Stader ETHx Live, Swaap V2 Live, Make esGMX Liquid, and more...

articles.description: Multichain Stops All Services Multichain was hacked and has announced it has stopped all services. All bridge transactions will be stuck on the source chain with unknown resume time. Earlier today Multichain bridge contracts saw major outflows due to potential exploits. â€œ
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Multichain Hacked, SEC Going After DeFi, Quest to Earn, and more...

articles.description: Blur V2 Live NFT marketplace Blur launches V2, enabling 50% gas reduction and trait bidding for NFTs. Surge Live on Arbitrum Surge is now live on Arbitrum. Surge is a lending protocol for longtail assets, built by the founder of Inverse. Pendle Live on BnB Chain

articles.description: Sommelier Morpho Integration Yield protocol Sommelier integrates Morpho to launch the RYETH and RYUSD vaults, using Morphon's optimizer to enhance returns. PancakeSwap on Polygon zkEVM PancakeSwap has been deployed on Polygon zkEVM (with swap feature supported) and joined Linea's testnet campaign.

articles.description: Archway L1 Live Archway, a Cosmos-based L1 with incentives for devs, has launched its mainnet. Archway plans to distribute a portion of the token emission directly to dApps. It will allocate 25% to devs and the remaining 75% to validators. stUSDT Live

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Velodrome V2 Live Velodrome launched V2 with a new VELO token. V2 enables new features including concentrated liquidity support, dynamic fees, dynamic emission rate, velodrome relay, enhanced UX, etc. V1 users will have about a week to migrate to V2 before the emission begins on V2 on June 29th.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Velodrome V2 Live, Prime Trust Halted Withdrawals, PENDLE Yield Boost, and more...

articles.description: MakerDAO Savings DAI MakerDAO announces Savings DAI (sDAI), a tokenized version of DSR-enabled DAI. sDAI is now available on Spark Protocol by depositing DAI in exchange for sDAI. Camelot AMM v3 Live Arbitrum-based DEX Camelot launches its AMM V3, backed by Algebraâ€™s concentrated liquidity engine and integrated with Paraswap.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - MakerDAO Savings DAI, Camelot AMM v3 Live, Stake to Yield, and more...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: Magpie Bridge Live Magpie, a non-custodial cross-chain swap, goes live and supports transfers between seven chains. Magpie uses Wormhole's Guardian Network to communicate asset swap signals between blockchains, in order to offer secure, efficient bridging.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Magpie Bridge Live, Dopex Option Scalps V2, Automated LPing, and more...

articles.author: ğ•¯ğ–†ğ–“ğ–Œğ–Šğ–—
articles.description: UK Approves Crypto Laws UK parliamentarians approved Financial Services and Markets Bill (FSMB) on Monday. FSMB is a new bill that could recognize crypto as a regulated activity and stablecoins as a means of payment under existing laws. The bill still needs further approval to be put into force.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - UK Approves Crypto Laws, opBNB Testnet Live, Incentives and Snapshots for Trading, and more...

articles.description: DLN Exchange Live DLN, a native cross-chain swap by deBridge, is live. DLN exchanges assets directly without asset wrapping or liquidity pool and offers fast transfers with incentives and without MEV, AMM fees, or slippage. Celsius to Sell Altcoins Celcius
articles.title: Today in DeFi - DLN Exchange Live, Celsius to Sell Altcoins, Delta-Neutral Vaults, and more...
